thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale
thread.title: Water Rams Distributorship Opportunity

title: Water Rams Distributorship Opportunity
text: AN AUSTRALIAN ICON - BILLABONG HYDRAULIC WATER RAM PUMPS (BBHWRs) - UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY TO OBTAIN DISTRIBUTORSHIP & MARKETING RIGHTS FOR YOUR COUNTRY PROVEN TECHNOLOGY FOR 159 YEARS - A TRULY GREEN PRODUCT WITH ZERO POLLUTION AND UNPARALEL LONGEVITY Misal Technologies Pty. Ltd. is currently seeking to open new global markets for our Billabong Hydraulic Water Ram Pumps (BBHWRs), and wishes to establish marketing distribution centres in several, strategically located global geographical areas, to achieve these objectives. The anticipated arrangement will be via Distributorship agreement for specific countries and / or predetermined market areas The Billabong Hydraulic Rams have been manufactured in Australia for the last 159 years and are used by thousands of satisfied Customers in Australia and the Pacific Region. Misal Technologies Pty. Ltd. is seeking expressions of interest from suitably qualified companies interested in acquiring long term distributorship rights for marketing of the Billabong Hydraulic Water Ram Pumps in pre agreed countries outside Australia. The Billabong Hydraulic Water Rams are considered a truly green product, with zero pollution. They pump water using only water and are an ideal tool for water transfer in hilly areas! They have an unparalleled reputation for their longevity, reliability and performance and are considered as field - proven technology. The BHWRs have received their recognition by the United Nations Development Aid Program by using the BBHWRs No. 7 for one of the Pacific Countries. We have Testimonials from various long term end users confirming using the BBHWRs for between 50 - 100+ years each. A video is available to view the BBHWRs by logging into www.misaltech.com; click on Billabong Tab. Offers for IP outright acquisition will also be considered. For further details please contact: The Managing Director
